item.description:
We came in third place this past week at Trivia Night, and were in first place for part of the evening. So let's go back and try to continue the winning streak - or at least have fun trying!

Hello Newcomers,
The Brickhouse Bar and Grill, http://www.brickhouse..., in Woonsocket has a live trivia night on Wednesdays. Basically we'll enter as a team and answer questions for prizes. I've played the game before at other bars and it's a lot of fun. It's not the electronic game that you play on a TV screen; the questions are asked out loud and you compete against other people at the bar.
We'll have a sign at our table so you'll know how to find us. Or you can call on my cell phone at (609) 577-1576.
I hope to see you there!
Marissa
item.name: Live Trivia at the Brickhouse Bar and Grill
